job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Software Engineer, gt.school (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Showcase your skills, not just your resume. Take on our challenges: 15-min Cognitive, 90-min Coding, 180-min Technical Decision-Making. Excel and you'll face a decisive interview with our Hiring Manager. More than half walk away with an offer. Ready to unleash your potential? Apply today!

   What you will be doing

     * Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools.
     * Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns, including AWS.
     * Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Spending time on minor bug fixes or features in outdated codebases.
     * Dealing with tedious infrastructure to keep poorly written products running.
     * Getting stuck in endless meetings discussing roadmaps and priorities or chasing people around.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on general software engineering tasks like building web applications and enhancing cloud-native backends. It does not mention any specific AI/ML technologies, models, frameworks, or tasks related to generative AI or predictive modeling, which are central to the GenAI Engineer and ML Engineer profiles. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it is a traditional software engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools' directly relates to developing user-facing applications, which is a core aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns' indicates work on the backend services and infrastructure supporting applications, a key part of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements' is a standard software development practice focused on code quality and maintainability.
job_tasks.phrase: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements

soft_skills.phrase: Reviewing code to ensure adherence to best practices, team standards, and customer requirements
Enhancing cloud-native backends using the latest serverless cloud patterns
Building modern web apps using top-notch libraries and tools
